meanings.definition: A flat sheet of metal used for making roofing or other construction materials.
meanings.sent1: The terneplates were stacked neatly in the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The roofer installed the terneplates on the new building.
meanings.sent3: The terneplates danced in the wind, creating a metallic melody.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a terneplate, absorbing every detail of the architecture.
meanings.sent5: The terneplates gleamed under the bright sun, reflecting the sky above.

meanings.definition: To cover or coat with a layer of terneplates.
meanings.sent1: The workers terneplated the roof to protect it from rust.
meanings.sent2: She carefully terneplates the metal to give it a shiny finish.
meanings.sent3: The chef terneplates the cake with edible silver for a special occasion.
meanings.sent4: His words terneplated her heart with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The artist terneplates the canvas with intricate designs, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: The act of manufacturing or producing terneplates.
meanings.sent1: The terneplate production was at its peak during the industrial revolution.
meanings.sent2: The factory workers specialized in the terneplate manufacturing process.
meanings.sent3: The terneplate production line hummed with efficiency and precision.
meanings.sent4: His passion for terneplate production drove him to innovate new techniques.
meanings.sent5: The history museum showcased the evolution of terneplate manufacturing over the years.
